html: 1.26.21  6:34 pm   what do you think about the events that have happened in the world the past few billion years

1.26.21  5:31 pm   I really liked how after the lyrics "time waits for no one/and it doesn't wait now either" you went straight into that instrumental, like time wasn't waiting for that verse to be completed. Was that intentional, or just a fun coincidence?

1.26.21  3:24 pm   Im getting into song writing and I cant stick to a genre. I wrote something very chillwave the other week and then the past 2 days I made something that has a marching band vibe to it. Would it be better to try and stick to a genre or just kinda flow with whatever Im coming up with?

1.25.21  11:55 pm   hi bill, could you please give me a random note to start my song on? i've never really written a song before but i've been playing music (mostly classical) for almost my entire life and i thought it might be neat to spice things up by composing something myself. problem is, i really don't know where to start, but if you gave me a note or even a random word that would probably give me enough motivation to at least get started. thanks
